org.ejvm.inspection

Class MethodInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejvm.inspection.MethodInformation

  • public final class MethodInformation
extends Object
    Encapsulates all information available about a method of an EjvmProgram.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sebastian Nicolai Kaupe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MethodInformation(int index, byte[] mtblEntry, byte[] dbgInfo)
      Creates a new MethodInformation object for the method which's information are passed as parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCompiledMethodSize()
      Returns the size of the compiled instructions belonging to this method.

      Returns the address of the debug information black for the method.

      Returns the number of local variables the method declares.

      Returns the address of the first instruction of the method.

      Returns the index of the method in the executable's method table.

      Returns the size of the method name (in byte).

    • Constructor Detail

      • MethodInformation

        public MethodInformation(int index,
                 byte[] mtblEntry,
                 byte[] dbgInfo)

        Creates a new MethodInformation object for the method which's information are passed as parameters.

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the method in the executable's method table.
        mtblEntry - The entry for the method from the executable's method table.
        dbgInfo - The debug information for the extracted method. If no debug information were compiled into the executable file, null or an empty array is expected.

    • Method Detail

      • getMethodIndex

        public int getMethodIndex()

        Returns the index of the method in the executable's method table.

        Returns:
        The index of the method in the method table.

      • getMethodAddress

        public int getMethodAddress()

        Returns the address of the first instruction of the method.

        Returns:
        The address of the first instruction of the method.

      • getParameterCount

        public int getParameterCount()

        Returns the number of parameters this method expects.

        Returns:
        The number of method parameters.

      • getLocalVariableCount

        public int getLocalVariableCount()

        Returns the number of local variables the method declares.

        Returns:
        The number of local variables.

      • getDebugInformationAddress

        public int getDebugInformationAddress()

        Returns the address of the debug information black for the method. If the executable was compiled without debug information, this method will return 0.

        Returns:
        The address of the debug information or 0 if no such exist.

      • getMethodNameSize

        public int getMethodNameSize()

        Returns the size of the method name (in byte).

        This is an optional information; if the executable was compiled omitting debug information, this method will return -1.

        Returns:
        The size of the name in byte or 0.

      • getCompiledMethodSize

        public int getCompiledMethodSize()
        Returns the size of the compiled instructions belonging to this method.

        This is an optional information; if the executable was compiled omitting debug information, this method will return -1.

        Returns:
        The byte size of the compiled method code.

      • getMethodName

        public String getMethodName()

        Returns the name of the method. A method name may contain up to 128 characters (but only a maximum of 256 UTF-16BE-encoded byte).

        This is an optional information;if the executable was compiled omitting debug information, this method will return an empty String.

        Returns:
        The name of the method.
